forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a bright, sunny sky, a welcome divergence from the usual pallor that often envelops the city. With temperatures poised to gently descend from the early afternoon high of 63, the air carries a crisp clarity, making the city’s architecture and natural beauty all the more striking. The gentle wind from the northwest whispers through the streets, adding to the invigorating charm of the day. Currently absent of fog, the panorama reveals a clear horizon, inviting an exploration of the vibrant neighborhoods bathed in sunlight.

As dusk approaches, a transition to a cooler evening will call for light layers—a soft sweater or a light jacket will suffice for comfort as the temperature dips to around 49. This delightful weather offers an ideal backdrop for a modest stroll through the bustling streets or a serene visit to one of the many parks, where the glow of the setting sun can be enjoyed in peace. Taking advantage of such a pleasant day may lead one to a quiet café, a cozy corner to savor a book, or a leisurely walk along the waterfront, indulging in the tranquility this splendid day affords.
